paragraphs: I don't tell you enough how much you mean to me. You're not just my girlfriend - you're my best friend, my safe place, my home.
When you can't sleep, I wish I could hold you until the worries fade away. When you're anxious, I want to remind you that you're stronger than you know.
Every day with you is a gift I never want to take for granted. Your laugh, your sleepy morning voice, the way you see beauty in everything - these are the things that make my world brighter.
I love you more than words can express, and I always will.

content.title: For Better Sleep
routine: 🛁 Warm bath with lavender or chamomile
📱 Put devices away 1 hour before bed
🎵 Listen to our sleep sounds or soft music
💭 Think of 3 good things from today
content.note: Remember: It's okay if sleep doesn't come right away. Just rest and know that tomorrow is a new day full of possibilities.

content.title: Dreams We'll Chase Together
adventures: 🎬 Have our own film festival weekend
📚 Read the same book and discuss it
💑 Grow old and still laugh together
content.note: Every adventure is better with you by my side.
